meanings.definition: The act of becoming a father.
meanings.sent1: His fatherings brought him great joy.
meanings.sent2: The fatherings of the puppies were adorable.
meanings.sent3: The fatherings of the ducklings made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His fatherings were like seeds of love blooming in his heart.
meanings.sent5: The fatherings of the kittens were a beautiful sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The process of creating or producing offspring.
meanings.sent1: The fatherings of the plants in the garden amazed her.
meanings.sent2: The fatherings of the birds in the nest were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent3: The fatherings of the trees seemed like a magical dance.
meanings.sent4: The fatherings of the bees were a buzzing symphony of life.
meanings.sent5: The fatherings of the fish in the pond were a sight of wonder.
